title: Open Channel Management - ObservedAsset
description: This entity contains temporal data made for Raw-Water (Open Channels) System Management domain.

type.description: Property. NGSI-LD Entity Type. It has to be ObservedAsset

dateObserved.description: Property. The date and time of this observation in ISO8601 UTCformat. Model:'https://schema.org/Datetime'

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

observedBy.description: Relationship. A relationship to the ID of the device that monitors raw-water properties. Model:'https://smart-data-models.github.io/dataModel.Device/device-schema.json'

monitoredProperty.description: Property. Monitored properties. Enum:'AverageVelocity, BatterySupply, GateOpening, SpecificConductivity, Turbidity, WaterFlow, WaterLevel, WaterTemperature, WaterVelocity'
